Articles.Content: Is it possible to improve the reclaiming of parts introduced? From what I've read anything that falls >2.5km away cannot be reclaimed because of how the physics engine works? Could you extend that or even count any stage that has sufficient parachutes attached and deployed as reclaimed?

Looks like someone's done this as a mod:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86691-0-24-DebRefund-v1-0-9
